lead_paragraph: Because for all of Koren Robinson’s undisputed talent, the 6-foot-1 frame, the sprinter’s speed, the Pro Bowl on his résumé, he has let folks down in the past.
snippet: Because for all of Koren Robinson’s undisputed talent, the 6-foot-1 frame, the sprinter’s speed, the Pro Bowl on his résumé, he has let folks down in the past.
